metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1685 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The Frontend in Zabbix before 1.8.20rc2, 2.0.x before 2.0.11rc2, and 2.2.xbefore 2.2.2rc1 allows remote "Zabbix Admin" users to modify the media ofarbitrary users via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zabbix-agent - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zabbix-frontend-php - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zabbix-java-gateway - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zabbix-proxy-mysql - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zabbix-proxy-pgsql - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zabbix-proxy-sqlite3 - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zabbix-server-mysql - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zabbix-server-pgsql - 1:2.2.2+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zabbix package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.2.2+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
